a1: My favorite team is the Dallas Cowboys.
q2: Being from a different sport, the Dallas Cowboys are very unlikely to ever face Croatia, don't you think?
a2: They could ever play a friendly even if they are not from the same league
q3: it would be very good for that game although you could listen to anything like croatian players
a3: I would have to agree with that statement.
q4: What did you think of Croatia in the World Cup?
a4: They played very well considering their country is so small.
